00015 // returns a random number between 0 and 1:
00016 double RNG::Random() {
00017 
00018   long double c;
00019   c = (long double)2111111111.0 * x[3] +
00020       1492.0 * (x[3] = x[2]) +
00021       1776.0 * (x[2] = x[1]) +
00022       5115.0 * (x[1] = x[0]) +
00023       x[4];
00024   x[4] = floor(c);
00025   x[0] = c - x[4];
00026   x[4] = x[4] * (1./(65536.*65536.));
00027   return x[0];
00028 }
00029 
00030 
00031 // returns integer random number in desired interval:
00032 ulong RNG::IRandom(int min, int max) {
00033         int iinterval = max - min + 1;
00034         if (iinterval <= 0) return 0x80000000; // error
00035         int i = long(iinterval * Random()); // truncate
00036         if (i >= iinterval) i = iinterval-1;
00037         return min + i;
00038 }
00039

00041 // this function initializes the random number generator:
00042 void RNG::RandomInit (ulong seed) {
00043         this->seed = seed;
00044         int i;
00045         unsigned long s = seed;
00046         // make random numbers and put them into the buffer
00047         for (i=0; i<5; i++) {
00048                 s = s * 29943829 - 1;
00049                 x[i] = s * (1./(65536.*65536.));
00050         }
00051 
00052         // randomize some more
00053         for (i=0; i<19; i++) 
00054                 Random();
00055 }
00056 
00057 // return a uniform random between 0 and 1
00058 double RNG::uniform() {
00059         return Random();
00060 }
00061 
00062 // flip a biased coin
00063 bool RNG::flip(double d) {
00064         return (uniform() <= d);
00065 }
00066 
00067 // reseed
00068 void RNG::reseed(ulong seed) {
00069         RandomInit(seed);
00070 }
00071 
00072 ulong RNG::random(int n) {
00073         return IRandom(0, n-1);
00074 }
00075 
00076 double RNG::dblRandom(double low, double high) {
00077         double nb = high - low +1;
00078         return (uniform() * nb) + low;
00079 }
00080 
00081 int RNG::intRandom(int low, int high) {
00082         return IRandom(low, high);
00083 }
